content:
Relax and unwind in Aurea Lounge with a variety of drink options on tap, including our house specialty cocktails, local beers, wines and spirits.

Make your experience complete with one of our great appetizers or a selection of salads and sandwiches.

Hours of Operation

Breakfast
6:30am – 10:30am, 7 days a week

Dinner
4:00 PM to 10:30 PM, daily

Bar/Lounge
4:00 PM to 12:00 AM, daily
